Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 3}, fatigued, and takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success] every [[/br {1d20} #minutes]]{1d20 minutes} (1 day)
